sqlMap.select:
SELECT tenant_id tenantId,name name,code code,logo logo,country country,province province, language language,zip_code zipCode,contract_num contractNum,currency currency,status status, time_zone timeZone,theme theme, to_char(create_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mm:ss') createDt, to_char(start_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mm:ss') startDt, to_char(end_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mm:ss') endDt FROM Tenant
TENANT_ID=#tenantId# CODE=#code# STATUS=#status#
